Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Chicago Ave/Austin
ShortDescription: EB 66 Chicago buses temp. rerouted: From the Terminal right turn, Chicago, Austin, Augusta, Central, and Chicago due to street blockage near Chicago Ave/Austin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #66 Chicago buses temp. rerouted: From the Terminal right turn, Chicago, Austin, Augusta, Central, and Chicago due to street blockage near Chicago Ave/Austin.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Reroute at 36th/Albany
ShortDescription: 35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via: Kedzie, 36th Place, and California due to, street blockage near 36th/Albany.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: Kedzie, 36th Place, and California due to, street blockage near 36th/Albany.

Allow extra travel time.
